SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.domain

Class GSTask

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.domain.GSTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GSTask extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Green Space Task (GSTask) in the system. This class manages the details and lifecycle of a task assigned to a Green Space.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GSTask

      public GSTask(String title, String description, String degreeOfUrgency, int expectedDuration, GreenSpace selectedGreenSpace)
      Constructs a new GSTask with the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the task.
      description - The description of the task.
      degreeOfUrgency - The degree of urgency of the task (Low, Medium, High).
      expectedDuration - The expected duration of the task in hours.
      selectedGreenSpace - The GreenSpace to which the task is assigned.

    • plan

      public void plan(String startingDate)
      Plans the task with the specified starting date.
      Parameters:
      startingDate - The starting date of the task in the format "year/month/day".
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the starting date format is invalid or the date is in the past.

    • isPending

      public boolean isPending()
      Checks if the task is pending.
      Returns:
      True if the task is pending, false otherwise.

    • hasUserEmail

      public boolean hasUserEmail(String email)
      Checks if the GreenSpace associated with the task has the specified user email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to check.
      Returns:
      True if the GreenSpace has the specified email, false otherwise.

    • hasTeam

      Checks if the task belongs to the specified team.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
